description: network_info dict should be like in xenapi. It is necessary for new nova-multinic blueprint implementation, becase there will passing same network_info for xenapi and other virt drivers
title: libvirt_conn._get_network_info() should generate same network_info as in xenapi

comments.content: netfork_info dict should be like in xenapi_con
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ilyaalekseyev

comments.content: A bit more detail on what the bug is (rather than how it will be fixed) would help in assessing its importance.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content:
Hi, Thierry.
I'm sorry, didn't fix it before you assess.
